page.title: 20Contributors
page.content: This record has been compiled by{Class {7}of{Bolsover C.E. Junior School. The following children and staff took part: {Neil Abbott,}Wayne Alsop, Julian Clayton,{Paul Collier, {Conrad Connolley,}Nigel Davies, Richard Doody,{Matthew Edwards, {Adrian Flude,}Neil Gascoyne, Stephen Hunter,{Ian Johnson, {Christopher Knowles,}Scott Parker, Paul Pether,{Neil Slater,}Marc Wright, {Julie Adams,}Claire Bradley, Lynne Burgess,{Gail Cooper, {Charlotte Creswell,}Louise Emmerson, Alison Farrer,{Claire Goodall, {Lisa Goodall,}Cathy Hodkin, Esther Holmes,{Julia Jenkins, {Caroline Mitchell,}Jayne Topley, Symone Wilson,{Mr. S. Alexander. All contributions edited by{Mr. S. {Alexander.
